text: @TerryMoran Hmm, he is saluting soldiers, holding his wife’s hand, has a nice suit on, and following the guidance for those in high-risk Covid-19 populations. He’s demonstrating that he believes in science and cares for others. I see nothing wrong. Covid-19 has reached WH staff so...
